~/Fixing "iertutil.dll was not found" after a Windows XP update

Tweet

07 Feb 2012

An XP machine wasn't working after an update. When we logged in an error popped up saying iertutil.dll was not found, and running explorer from task manager gave a cascade of the same errors. Following these instructions I found iertutil.dll in C:\Windows\system32\dllcache and copied it into C:\Windows\system32 using Tak Manager's Open dialog. Grooving.
